name: zebra-snr
short_description:
Zebra-snr Utility Management System is a robust rating, billing and revenue management solution for managing utility services delivered to domestic, commercial and institutional customers. The system is highly feature-rich - developed, and supported with skills from relevant utility industries - and relies on a plug-in architecture to allow facilitate future expansion and new capabilities. The “snr” suffix is an acronym for “service neutral rating” to indicate that the system can deal with rating for any transactional utility (eg water, telecom, sewage) using an appropriate rule-base.
The first target utility space to be considered comprises water (fresh) utilities.
summary: Service-neutral rating, billing and management system for utilites
